title: binimal
author: binimal
content: As a developer I am thinking about contributing to the Bitcoin and Lightning Network adoption by creating a concept app to buy beer using BTC. Payments could be handled via Open Node. Would you use such an app? Any thoughts?

comments.author: Marshall Chord
comments.body: Yes, I would definitely use such an app! It would be a great way to encourage more people to use Bitcoin and the Lightning Network, and make it easier to purchase items using these technologies. I think it would be important to ensure that the payment process is easy and secure, so users feel comfortable with the technology. Thanks for your idea!

comments.author: binimal
comments.body: Thanks for the good vibes! Already have a Figma prototype. Will code it using Flutter and try to launch a first version by EOY. Will got you posted about the progress here! Thanks again. Was in need of a favorable opinion to get impulse. Cheers!
